tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_sentiment_analysis (
user_id INT,
username VARCHAR(50),
post_text TEXT,
sentiment_score FLOAT,
post_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    followers_count INT,
    following_count INT,
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT,
    posted_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reactions (
    reaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    reaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    reaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    comment_content TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);
